REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0843 reute d f BC-C.O.M.B.-<CMCO.O>-UNI 06-19 0055

TEXT.TITLE: C.O.M.B. <CMCO.O> UNIT IN NEW SEVEN-YEAR PACT
TEXT.BODY: C.O.M.B. Co said its Cable Value Network (CVN) unit has reached an agreement in principle with Tele-Communications Inc <TCOM.O> to extend its current affiliation agreement to a new seven-year term. C.O.M.B. is a direct mail and video marketing company. Reuter
